label-payment-approved: Congratulations, your payment has been approved!
label-payment-declined: We're sorry, your payment has been declined!
label-payment-approved-message: We have sent the purchase information to your registered email. You can also check the summary of your purchase below and download your voucher.
label-payment-declined-message: We were unable to process your payment. Please verify your card details or try another payment method. You can also contact your bank for more information.
label-retry-payment: Try again or choose another payment method
